accessDeniedError2.description: Message shown when the server denies access (unclear reason)
accessDeniedError2.message: The server sent an 'Access denied' message - please check your e-mail and password in the options dialog and try again.

addLanguage.description: Caption of the select-element for (preferred) languages

addToDictionaryCaption.description: Title hover shown in the popup to accept a word to the internal dictionary

addonsSiteNotSupported.description: Error shown when Firefox add-on is used on https://addons.mozilla.org, which doesn't work for technical reasons
addonsSiteNotSupported.message: Sorry, LanguageTool doesn't work on the website of Firefox Add-ons (addons.mozilla.org). It works anywhere else you write (e.g. Facebook, Gmail, Twitter, LinkedIn).

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Check your texts for spelling and grammar problems everywhere on the web

appDescThunderbird.description: The description of the application, displayed in the Thunderbird web store.
appDescThunderbird.message: Check your e-mails for spelling and grammar issues

appName.description: The name of the application, displayed in the web store.

appStoreDesc1.description: Description item 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc1.message: Finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect

appStoreDesc10.description: Description paragraph 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc10.message: With this extension you can check text with the free style and grammar checker LanguageTool. LanguageTool finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, like mixing up there/their, a/an, or repeating a word, and it can detect some grammar problems. It supports more than 25 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Polish, and Russian.

appStoreDesc2.description: Description item 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

appStoreDesc20.description: Description paragraph 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc20.message: LanguageTool is designed with simplicity in mind. It instantly checks the spelling and grammar of any text in the current text field. LanguageTool is compatible with almost all text, regardless of source, including social networks such as Twitter or LinkedIn and online e-mail services, such as Gmail.

appStoreDesc3.description: Description item 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

appStoreDesc30.description: Description paragraph 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc30.message: With LanguageTool, we aim to give users a fully-featured grammar checker and proofreader that will enable them to have control and confidence over their content. While LanguageTool is a vital extension for non-native speakers, it’s also smart enough to recognize many mistakes that native speakers commonly make. This grammar and spelling correction works across all variations of common language; distinguishing between U.S. and British English, for instance. LanguageTool also features a personal dictionary for exceptions or words that you might commonly use but that are not found in a conventional dictionary. LanguageTool will recognize these words in future grammar checking and proofreading.

appStoreDesc4.description: Description item 4 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc4.message: Works on almost any website including Gmail, Facebook, Twitter

appStoreDesc60.description: Description paragraph 5 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc60.message: Unlike Grammarly (a.k.a. Grammerly :-) and Ginger, LanguageTool works for many languages.

appStoreDesc70.description: Description paragraph 6a in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc70.message: Your privacy is important to us: By default, this extension will check your text by sending it to https://languagetool.org over a securely encrypted connection. No account is needed to use this extension. We don't store your IP address. See https://languagetool.org/privacy/ for our privacy policy.

appStoreDesc71.description: Description paragraph 6b in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc71.message: Please send bug reports or questions to https://forum.languagetool.org

appStoreDesc80.description: Description paragraph 7 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc80.message: List of supported languages: English (Australian, Canadian, UK, New Zealand, South African, US), French, German (Austria, Germany, Swiss), Asturian, Belarusian, Breton, Catalan (also Valencian), Chinese, Danish, Dutch, Esperanto, Galician, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Khmer, Persian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal, Angola, Mozambique), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil, Ukrainian, Arabic

attachScreenshot.description: Text shown next to a checkbox that decideds whether a screenshot should be attached to an email

autoCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check on all domains by default
autoCheckDesc.message: Auto-check on all domains by default

autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text will run automatically in background

changelog2020FeatureSectionAppDescriptio.description: Headline for the section that explains the desktop App in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionAppDescriptio.message: With the LanguageTool desktop app for Mac, you have access to all your texts at any time. Use the system-wide keyboard shortcut and check texts from the clipboard or common word processors without losing important formatting.

changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorDescrip.description: Text for the section that explains the editor in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorDescrip.message: The LanguageTool Editor is here to give you a distraction-free writing experience. Moreover, our so-called "picky mode" will provide many additional suggestions to perfect your text.

changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorHeadlin.description: Headline for the section that explains the editor in depth

changelog2020FeatureSectionOverleafDescr.description: Headline for the section that explains the Overleaf integration in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionOverleafDescr.message: Use LanguageTool for your scientific work. With the Overleaf integration of the browser add-on, you can give your texts the final touch.

changelog2020FeatureSectionServicesDescr.description: Text for the section that explains that LT now supports more services than ever (up to 200 characters)

motherTongueExpl.message: Set mother tongue if you want to be warned about false friends when checking texts not written in your mother tongue.

msOnlineOfficeNotSupported.description: Error shown when clicking the toolbar icon at Microsoft Word Online
msOnlineOfficeNotSupported.message: Sorry, Microsoft Word Online is not supported by this extension - just install this extension instead.

noErrorsFound2.description: Shown in popup when no errors have been found

noErrorsFoundText.description: Shown in popup when no errors have been found as a subheadline
noErrorsFoundText.message: You can be proud of yourself

onboardLanguageSelectorCta.description: Button text in the onboarding's preferred language selector section

onboardLanguageSelectorDescription.description: Decription of the onboarding's preferred language selector section
onboardLanguageSelectorDescription.message: To provide you the best suggestions, we need to know what languages you use most often.

onboardLanguageSelectorHeading.description: Headline of the onboarding's preferred language selector section
onboardLanguageSelectorHeading.message: Select the languages you typically write

onboardingHeadline.description: Text shown to the user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on
onboardingHeadline.message: Your writing will now be improved

onboardingIntro.description: Text shown to the user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on
onboardingIntro.message: Your text will now be checked in most text fields while you type.

onboardingIntroThunderbird.description: Text shown to a thunderbird user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on
onboardingIntroThunderbird.message: Your text will now be checked while you compose your e-mails.

onboardingNote1.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote1.message: Reload all open web pages to activate the extension

onboardingNote2.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote2.message: This extension does not work with text fields in the Chrome Web Store or on addons.mozilla.org

onboardingNote3.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote3.message: To disable the extension for a website, click the LT icon in the browser toolbar

onboardingNote4.description: Installation note that describes how to use synonyms. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote4.message: Synonyms can be requested by double-clicking a word in a text field (e.g. on Gmail, Facebook or Google Docs)

onboardingNoteThunderbird1.description: Installation note. Shown once the thunderbird user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNoteThunderbird1.message: Start a new email to activate the extension.

onboardingNoteThunderbird2.description: Installation note. Shown once the thunderbird user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNoteThunderbird2.message: To disable the extension, click the LT icon in the top-right of the email composing window.

otherServer.description: Radio button label for the server URL if neither cloud nor local server is the correct choice
otherServer.message: Other server - requires LanguageTool server running there

overleafNewTeaserText.message: Scroll through your text to see spelling, grammar and style suggestions.

popupGeneralSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for general settings shown in the addon popup

popupGlobalSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for the global settings shown in the addon popup

popupGlobalSettingsHeadlineInfo.description: Adds more context regarding the scope to the headline for the global settings shown in the addon popup

popupOnboardingHeadline.description: Title shown on top of a list explaining how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingHeadline.message: Welcome! You can now use LanguageTool:

popupOnboardingStep1.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep1.message: Click in any multi-line text field (e.g. on Gmail, Facebook, …)

popupOnboardingStep2.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep2.message: You will find an icon that looks like $icon1Html$ or $icon2Html$ in the bottom-right corner

popupOnboardingStep3.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep3.message: Type some text. Writing issues will be <u>underlined</u>

popupOnboardingStep4.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep4.message: Click on an underlined word to get suggestions

popupOpenEditorButton.description: Button that opens the LanguageTool Editor

popupOptionPickyMode.description: Label for enabling/disabling picky mode functionality globally (displayed next to a checkbox)

popupOptionPickyModeDescription.description: Description label for enabling/disabling picky mode functionality globally (displayed next to a checkbox)
popupOptionPickyModeDescription.message: For perfect style, tonality and typography

popupOptionSynonyms.description: Label for enabling/disabling synonym functionality (displayed next to a checkbox)

popupOptionSynonymsDescription.description: Description label for enabling/disabling synonym functionality (displayed next to a checkbox)
popupOptionSynonymsDescription.message: Double-click on any word in a multiline text field to see synonyms

popupPremiumText.message: Upgrade to LanguageTool Premium to not only find more grammar and punctuation errors, but also text style issues.

popupSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for the website specific settings shown in the addon popup

popupSettingsHeadlineInfo.description: Adds more context regarding the scope to the headline for the website specific settings shown in the addon popup

popupSettingsHover.description: Mouse hover over the settings icon

poweredBy.description: Hint that explains who the author of this add-on is

premiumErrorsButton.description: Button shown in premium teaser that sends the user to the pricing table. Button text should be as short as possible

premiumErrorsTextPlural.description: Hint shown in a premium teaser, telling the user that there are more issues that only the premium version found
premiumErrorsTextPlural.message: Your text contains $count$ advanced writing issues

premiumErrorsTextSingular.description: Hint shown in a premium teaser, telling the user that there are more issues that only the premium version found
premiumErrorsTextSingular.message: Your text contains one advanced writing issue

privacyLinkForDefaultServer.message: For details, see our privacy policy

privacyListSwitchable.description: Privacy list item. Shown as additional information to privacy note.
privacyListSwitchable.message: Checking can be disabled at any time

privacyListUnsaved.description: Privacy list item. Shown as additional information to privacy note.

privacyNoteForDefaultServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using the default server on languagetool.org
privacyNoteForDefaultServer.message: This extension will check your text by sending it to $serverHost$ over an encrypted connection. Your text will not be stored. Checking can be disabled at any time.

privacyNoteForOtherServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using some other than the default server
privacyNoteForOtherServer.message: This extension will check your text by sending it to $serverUrl$. To switch back to the default server, please visit the extension's options page.

privacyNoteSlogan.description: Slogan after 'LanguageTool' shown in privacy dialog at first start

privacyPolicy.description: Options dialog: Link to privacy policy

punctuationError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

ratingHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to rate the add-on

ratingText.description: Text shown in the teaser that asks user to rate the add-on

ratingThankYou.description: Message shown to the user after he rated

ratingUnhappyQuestion.description: If user gives a negative rating, we ask the user why he's unhappy
ratingUnhappyQuestion.message: Please tell us why you are unhappy

removeExtraWhitespace.description: Button to remove consecutive white space

reportAnIssue.description: Link text for sending feedback to languagetool.org

reviewChromeHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Chrome Store
reviewChromeHeadline.message: Would you give us a rating in the Chrome Store?

reviewEdgeHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Edge Add-On Store
reviewEdgeHeadline.message: Would you give us a rating in the Edge Add-ons Store?

reviewFirefoxHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Firefox Add-On Store
reviewFirefoxHeadline.message: Would you give us a rating in the Firefox Store?

reviewOperaHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Opera Add-On Store
reviewOperaHeadline.message: Would you give us a rating in the Opera Add-ons Store?

reviewSafariHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Apple App Store
reviewSafariHeadline.message: Would you give us a rating in the App Store?

sendFeedback.description: Link text for sending feedback to languagetool.org

serverNotAvailable.description: Warning shown to the user that the local server isn't available

serverText.description: Options dialog: description of the text field for the API server URL

serverUrlIsInvalid.description: Options dialog: error shown if server URL is not valid, e.g. doesn't start with http or https

settingsAccountBulletListEditor.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountBulletListEditor.message: Use the editor as a distraction-free writing environment

settingsAccountBulletListSave.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page

settingsAccountBulletListSync.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountBulletListSync.message: Synchronize your settings and personal dictionary across multiple browsers and devices

settingsAccountDescription.description: Description for the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountDescription.message: Log in and benefit from the following advantages:

settingsAccountHeadline.description: Headline for the account login section on the settings page

settingsAccountSubheadline.description: Subheadline for the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountSubheadline.message: Log in with your LanguageTool account

settingsAddAutoCheckDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of autocheck domains
settingsAddAutoCheckDomainHint.message: This domain hasn't been added yet. Press RETURN to add it.

settingsAddDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of ignored domains
settingsAddDomainHint.message: This domain hasn't been added yet. Press RETURN to add it.

settingsAddIgnoredDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of ignored domains
settingsAddIgnoredDomainHint.message: This domain hasn't been added yet. Press RETURN to add it.

settingsAddOrFilterAutoCheckDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon should autocheck texts

settingsAddOrFilterDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon shouldn't run on

settingsAddOrFilterIgnoredDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon shouldn't autocheck texts

settingsAddOrFilterWords.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter new words for his dictionary (he can use the input field also for searching in his dictionary)

settingsAddWordHint.description: Text shown when the entered word doesn't exist yet in the personal dictionary
settingsAddWordHint.message: This word doesn't exist yet in your dictionary. Press RETURN to add it.

settingsAreYouSure.description: Confirmation message for when the user wants to clear or delete something.
settingsAreYouSure.message: Are you sure? There's no undo.

settingsClearAll.description: Button text that deletes all items in a list

settingsCopyDictionary.description: Button text that copy all words from personal dictionary to clipboard

settingsCopyDictionarySuccessful.description: Message shown when dictionary copied to clipboard successful.

settingsDeleteAutoCheckDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of autocheck domains

settingsDeleteIgnoredDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of ignored domains

settingsDictionaryHeadline.description: Headline for the personal dictionary section on the settings page

settingsDomainInvalid.description: Error message shown when the domain the user entered is not valid or is already in the list
settingsDomainInvalid.message: Please enter a valid domain that hasn't been added yet.

settingsEmptyAutoCheckDomains.description: Text shown when autocheck domains list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyAutoCheckDomains.message: You haven't enabled auto-check on any websites yet

settingsEmptyDictionary.description: Text shown when personal dictionary doesn't contain any words (yet)
settingsEmptyDictionary.message: Your personal dictionary is currently empty

settingsEmptyDomainList.description: Text shown when disabled-domain list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyDomainList.message: You haven't disabled any websites yet

settingsEmptyIgnoredDomains.description: Text shown when ignored domains list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyIgnoredDomains.message: You haven't disabled auto-check on any websites yet

settingsEmptyIgnoredRules.description: Text shown when there are no ignored rules (yet)
settingsEmptyIgnoredRules.message: You haven't disabled any rules yet. You can disable rules once they appear in a text.

settingsEnableAllRules.description: Button text that enables all grammar rules that were previously disabled

settingsEnableDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of disabled-domains

settingsExperimentalSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user saves the experimental settings
settingsExperimentalSuccess.message: Your settings have been successfully saved.

settingsForgotPasswordLink.description: Placeholder text for password text field

settingsLanguageVariantsDescription.description: Description of the language variants section in the options panel
settingsLanguageVariantsDescription.message: To always provide you with the best suggestions, please let us know which variant of the individual languages you speak.

settingsLanguageVariantsHeadline.description: Headline of the language variants section in the options panel

settingsLoggedInAs.description: Text shown for users who have logged in with their LanguageTool account

settingsLoginButton.description: Button for logging in with email and password

settingsLoginError.description: Error message shown when the user credentials (email and password) are wrong
settingsLoginError.message: You couldn't be logged in. Please check your e-mail and password.

settingsLoginSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user logged in

settingsLogoutSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user logged out

settingsManageAccountButton.description: Button for going to the account section

settingsPasswordPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for password text field

settingsPreferredLanguagesCompleteList.description: Caption of the sub-list of all available languages in the preferred languages dropdown

settingsPreferredLanguagesDescription.description: Description of the preferred languages section in the options panel
settingsPreferredLanguagesDescription.message: Set the languages you usually use to write texts. This helps LanguageTool in automatically detecting the right language.

settingsPreferredLanguagesHeadline.description: Headline of the preferred languages section in the options panel

settingsPreferredLanguagesPopularList.description: Caption of the sub-list of popular languages in the preferred languages dropdown

settingsPremiumButton.description: Button text for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality

settingsPremiumFeaturesActivated.description: Text shown for users who have logged in with their LanguageTool account and who have a paid subscription

settingsPremiumHeadline.description: Headline for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality

settingsPremiumText.description: Text for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality
settingsPremiumText.message: Find advanced grammar, style and punctuation issues or check texts with up to 100,000 characters.

settingsServerUrlDisabled.description: Explains why the custom server URL can't be changed when logged in.
settingsServerUrlDisabled.message: You can only set a custom server URL when you log out with your LanguageTool account.

siteCannotBeSupported.description: Some sites are too complex and can probably never be supported, so we show this error
siteCannotBeSupported.message: Sorry, this site uses a technology for its text editing that we cannot support. Please contact the site owners and ask them to integrate LanguageTool.

spellingError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

statusIconEnableLT.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in disabled state
statusIconEnableLT.message: Enable LanguageTool - Spelling and Grammar Check

statusIconError.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in error state

statusIconMoreErrors.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in incomplete result state
statusIconMoreErrors.message: Results are incomplete: Text checking was stopped due to too many errors.

statusIconPermissionRequired.description: Shown when hover over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in permission required state (i.e. user has not confirmed privacy dialog on first start)
statusIconPermissionRequired.message: Cannot check text - confirm privacy policy first

statusIconReload.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in reload needed state
statusIconReload.message: The extension has been updated. Please reload page to enable spell and grammar checking.

statusIconToolTip.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one)

suggestionError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumButton.description: Button that tells the user he has to upragde to see all suggestions

suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumText.description: Hint that tells the user that the current mistake that they are seeing is only available for Premium users
suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumText.message: This is an advanced suggestion that is only available in the Premium version of LanguageTool. Upgrade to Premium to get suggestions like this and many more.

synonymsCardGeneralError.description: Generic error message shown when there was an issue getting a synonym from the server
synonymsCardGeneralError.message: There was an error loading synonyms

synonymsCardHeadline.description: Headline for the box that offers thesaurus synonyms

synonymsCardLanguageNotSupported.description: Message shown when synonyms are not supported for the current text language
synonymsCardLanguageNotSupported.message: Synonyms for this language aren't supported yet.

synonymsCardLoading.description: Text shown when synonyms are still being loaded from the server

synonymsCardNoSynonymsAvailable.description: Message shown when there are no synonyms for the given word
synonymsCardNoSynonymsAvailable.message: No synonyms available for this word

synonymsCardTooltipReadText.description: Tool tip for text to speach button, reads out loud a word or text

synonymsTutorialHeadline.description: Headline for a small box that explains how the new synonym feature works

synonymsTutorialText.description: Text in a small box that explains how the new synonym feature works
synonymsTutorialText.message: Get synonyms for any word by double-clicking on it. Works in every text field that LanguageTool supports.

textTooLong.description: Message shown to the user when his text is too large to be checked
textTooLong.message: Sorry, this text is too long to be checked.

timeoutError.description: Error message shown if API server doesn't respond timely
timeoutError.message: Timeout from server - please try again later ($serverUrl$)

tooManyErrors.description: Message shown to the user when his text contains too many errors
tooManyErrors.message: This text seems to contain too many issues. Are you sure that the correct language is selected?

tooManyRequests.description: Message shown to the user when they have sent too many and/or large requests
tooManyRequests.message: Request limit exceeded - please wait a minute and LanguageTool should be available again.

tryAgain.description: Link the user can click on when they got a warning that the local server isn't available

turnOffPickyMode.description: Button that allows to turn off picky mode in the current text field.
turnOffPickyMode.message: Turn off picky mode in this text

turnOffRule.description: Link shown in the popup to turn off, i.e. ignore, a rule (the rule - not just this match)

turnOffRulePicky.description: Link shown in the popup to turn off, i.e. ignoring a rule is not allowed
turnOffRulePicky.message: Grammar suggestions cannot be turned off in picky mode

turnOnHint.message: You can enable the extension again here

unknownError.description: Message shown to the user when his text is too large to be checked
unknownError.message: Sorry, something went wrong while checking your text. Restarting your browser might solve this.

upgradeTeaserDiscountHeadline.description: Headline for the discount teaser that should raise urgency

username.description: Options dialog: user name for languagetoolplus.com

validatorHasMistakesHeadlinePlural.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors

validatorHasMistakesHeadlineSingular.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors

validatorHasMistakesText.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors
validatorHasMistakesText.message: Click on the highlighted words to correct them.

validatorHasPremiumErrorsButton.description: Button that sends the user to the upgrade/pricing page

validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlinePlural.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlinePlural.message: Your text contains $count$ advanced writing issues

validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlineSingula.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlineSingula.message: Your text contains one advanced writing issue

validatorHasPremiumErrorsText.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsText.message: Upgrade to LanguageTool Premium to find many more grammar, style and punctuation mistakes

validatorLoadingHint.description: Loading status, shown when text is currently being checked

validatorNoMistakesHeadline.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text doesn't contain any errors

validatorNoTextStatus.description: Text shown above validator text field when it doesn't have enough characters to be checked
validatorNoTextStatus.message: Type or paste your text to check it

validatorPlaceholder.description: Text shown in text field when it's empty
validatorPlaceholder.message: Please enter or paste your text here …

validatorPremiumButton.description: Label for a button. Clicking it will send the user to the website where he can buy the premium version

validatorPremiumHeadline.description: Title for a bullet point list of features the premium version has
validatorPremiumHeadline.message: Find more writing issues and become a better writer

validatorPremiumReason1.description: Reason for buying the premium version
validatorPremiumReason1.message: More sophisticated grammar, punctuation and style checking

validatorPremiumReason2.description: Reason for buying the premium version

validatorPremiumReason3.description: Reason for buying the premium version
validatorPremiumReason3.message: Auto-detection for invalid numbers (e.g. IBAN, ISBN, …)

validatorPremiumReason4.description: Reason for buying the premium version

validatorTextTooLongStatus.description: Text shown above validator text field when text is too long for validation
validatorTextTooLongStatus.message: Sorry, this text is too long to be checked.

variantCaDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantDeDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantEnDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantPtDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

webstoreSiteNotSupported.description: Error shown when Chrome extension is used on https://chrome.google.com/webstore, which doesn't work for technical reasons
webstoreSiteNotSupported.message: Sorry, LanguageTool doesn't work on the website of the Chrome Web Store. It works anywhere else you write (e.g. Facebook, Gmail, Twitter, LinkedIn).
